basics.name: Ethan Lewellin
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Data scientist with a background in environmental remediation and a strong foundation in applied statistics and bioinformatics. I hold a B.S. in Applied Statistics and an M.S. in Data Science from the Colorado School of Mines. Iâ€™m passionate about applying data-driven methods to problems in bioinformatics, biostatistics, and computational biology.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
